getAllCels()
Returns a vector full of all the costume segment cels in this costume.
getAnimationNamed(String)
Returns an animation matching this name, or null if none.
getCelNamed(String, String, String, String)
Returns the CostumeSegmentCel in the specified orientation with the given name, or null if none.
getCels(String, String, String)
Returns the list of CostumeSegmentCels for the specified segment and orientation.

Returns the choreography stored in this structure.

Returns a gesture matching this name, or null if none.

Returns the name of the costume.

Returns a position matching this name, or null if none.

Returns the CostumeSegment with the given name, or null if none.

Returns the specified orientation's position in the ordered sequence of orientations in each CostumeSegment.

Costume 
  public Costume()

getAllCels 
  public Vector getAllCels()
Returns a vector full of all the costume segment cels in this costume. Useful for pre-caching the art.
getCelNamed 
  public CostumeSegmentCel getCelNamed(String segmentName,
                                       String orientationName,
                                       String mood,
                                       String celName)
Returns the CostumeSegmentCel in the specified orientation with the given name, or null if none.
getCels 
  public Vector getCels(String segmentName,
                        String orientationName,
                        String mood)
Returns the list of CostumeSegmentCels for the specified segment and orientation.
getChoreography 
  public Choreography getChoreography()
Returns the choreography stored in this structure.
getAnimationNamed 
  public Animation getAnimationNamed(String animationName)
Returns an animation matching this name, or null if none. Searches only in the costume's choreography.
See Also:
Choreography
getGestureNamed 
  public Gesture getGestureNamed(String gestureName)
Returns a gesture matching this name, or null if none. Searches only in the costume's choreography.
See Also:
Choreography
getPositionNamed 
  public Position getPositionNamed(String positionName)
Returns a position matching this name, or null if none. Searches only in the costume's choreography.
See Also:
Choreography
getSegmentNamed 
  public CostumeSegment getSegmentNamed(String segmentName)
Returns the CostumeSegment with the given name, or null if none.
getName 
  public String getName()
Returns the name of the costume.
orientationIndex 
  public int orientationIndex(String orientationName)
Returns the specified orientation's position in the ordered sequence of orientations in each CostumeSegment. This sequence is the same for every CostumeSegment in a costume. Returns -1 if the costume has no segments.
See Also:
CostumeSegment
setChoreography 
  public void setChoreography(Choreography newChoreography)
Sets the choreography stored in this structure
setName 
  public void setName(String newName)
Sets the name of the costume to newName.
See Also:
getName
validate 
  public void validate(Structure structure)
Debugging routine to validate consistency of defined costume elements with respect to structure. This includes checking whether the correct set of registration points are defined. If it finds inconsistencies, it prints messages to the command line.
classNameToEncode 
  public String classNameToEncode(RtEncoder encoder)
encode 
  public void encode(RtEncoder encoder)
decode 
  public Object decode(RtDecoder decoder)
